title: The Lament of Reverend Bishop
description: Reverend Gerald Bishop has lost his faith. In 4000 AD, he joined a medical mission of mercy to a distant sector along with several other survivors. He was lost and bewildered by the new world of the 41st Century.But twenty years later, he and a handful of others are struggling to stay alive whilst a deadly -and disturbingly familiar- plague ravages entire sectors of space.As his friends and colleagues drop from illness, he will come to realise that there are greater threats out there...Threats in the shape of The Core...
author: John Charles Scott
